# Dida MCP Server

Hotel search, booking, and review MCP server.

## Features

- 🏨 Search hotels with 12+ detailed fields
- 📅 Book hotel rooms
- ⭐ View hotel reviews

## Installation
```bash
pip install dida-mcp-server


Usage
Local (stdio)
bashpython -m src.server
Remote (SSE)
bashpython -m src.sse_server
